fu.polyarea

Class PolyArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.polyarea.PolyArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PolyArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing a polygonal area.
    Author:
    Jan Quadflieg, Daniel Weinand
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • PolyArea

        public PolyArea(GPSPosition center,
        double radius,
        int edges)
        Creates a new instance of PolyArea, by approximating a circle with a given center and radius (in m). The circle is approximated by regular polygon with the given number of edges. Remark: the circle must not contain a pole and should not exceed 3 degees longitude.

      • distanceToBorderMetric

        public double distanceToBorderMetric(GPSPosition pos)
        Method to get the minimum distance (in m) between this area and the given GPS position. Note that this method computes the distance to the border, i.e. points inside the area return a distance > 0.

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Return area in the internal format (i.e. square GPS degrees) which has only a meaning when comparing areas

      • getAreaMetric

        public double getAreaMetric()
        Returns the area in square meters which is much more time-consuming than the getArea method. Note that the method only returns useful result, if the area is considerable small (i.e. smaller than 1 degree of latitude of longitude)

      • getInteriorPoint

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getInteriorPoint()
